casebody.data:
SOL MEGDALL v. ORIGINAL HOFFMAN’S INC., a Florida corporation, and HOFFMANS, INC., a Florida corporation. 32 So. (2nd) 741

June Term, 1947

November 18, 1947 Division A Rehearing denied December 19, 1947 Hylan H. Kout and Murrell, Fleming & Flowers, for appellant. Arnovitz, Weinkle & Arnovitz for Hoffman’s Collins, Inc., and Meyer Weiss & Rosen and Vivion B. Rutherford for Original Hoffman’s Inc., appellees. PER CURIAM:

Affirmed on authority of Nichol v. Bressler, et al., 159 Fla. 668, 32 So. (2nd) 457, this day decided. See Robertson v. Williams, 158 Fla. 163, 28 So. (2nd) 114.

THOMAS, C. J., TERRELL, CHAPMAN and SEBRING, JJ., concur.
